_description: Advice to turn away from evil and do good, in a Latin sermon — one macaronic couplet

CULIi38.Transcription: Diuerte a malo for dredeFac bonum ffor mede
CULIi38.Note:
In sermon, ‘Declina a malo et fac bonum’ (ff.
                    142-144).
